execution_plan.description: Get the date of the earliest order from the Orders table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT MIN(date_order_placed) AS earliest_date FROM Orders;

execution_plan.description: Get order IDs and dates for orders that have more than one item (orders with COUNT(order_item_id) > 1).
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.order_id, o.date_order_placed FROM Orders o JOIN (SELECT order_id FROM Order_Items GROUP BY order_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) multi ON o.order_id = multi.order_id;
